title: The Dream - Get Dreamy (1967) Progressive rock,Psychedelic
description:
The Dream - Get Dreamy (1967) - Norway

Another lost pearl from the late 60&#039;s. I&#039;m always surprised how much good music there was in this era all over the world. This album is bluesy and psychedelic and Terje Rypdal plays a real fuzzy guitar here.


Tom Karlsen (percussion)
Christian Reim (piano, organ, vocal)
Hans Marius Stormoen (bass)
Terje Rypdal (guitar, vocal)

1 Green Things (From Outer Space) 3:16 
2 Emptiness Gone 2:27 
3 Ain`t no Use 8:22 
4 Driftin 3:04 
5 I`m Counting on You 3:06 
6 Night of the Lonely Organist and His Mysterious Pals 5:46 
7 You 2:22 
8 You`re Right About Me 2:44 
9 Hey Jimmi 2:58
